highlights: Converted an outdated natural disaster management website to a full-stack Vue/PHP/MySQL application used by the Department of Homeland Security
Developed an EPA application for the public to view local water quality data using React and Esri's ArcGIS JavaScript API to produce high-detail informative map visualizations
Created an internal browser extension for the CDC to automate the process of reporting fradulent COVID-19 preventative products on online marketplaces including Amazon and eBay
Rebuilt the home page of a government waste management website to reduce page load times by 80% and improved SEO to increase site traffic from 1,000 monthly users to consistently over 20,000
Achieved 100% test coverage and full WCAG accessibility compliance on a flagship EPA React application
Assigned and graded Python assignments and exams
Tutored students individually and held weekly sessions with the entire class to review course material
Updated and maintained the town website through a CMS
Automated time-consuming IT processes by writing a script to identify water bills made in error and flag them for manual review
